explains: v. 使不同；求……的微分；区别

sentences.en: I can't differentiate one variety from another.
sentences.cn: 我无法将这几个品种区别开来。

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 孩子也许无法区分想像与真实世界的差别。

sentences.en: As a general rule, it's important to differentiate between effectiveness and absolute time commitments.
sentences.cn: 一般说来，区别效率和绝对的时间投入很重要。
